text:
It would be great to have the possibilty to launch a .jmx file (by cmd command for example) with an automatic process and get the result file built with a summary report or an aggregate graph.
Each time we make a test, we have to push the "Save table data" button to export the result in a csv file. A automatic process will be super !!

Thanks a lot.
creator: nicolas.maurel@socomec.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
